Package dao

Class ClientDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.ClientDAO
public class ClientDAO
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the link to the database and implements static methods which execute queries on the corresponding tables from the database

  • Method Details

    • findById

      public static Client findById​(int clientid)
      This method executes the query "SELECT * FROM ordermanagement.client WHERE id = ?"
      Parameters:
      clientid - The id of the client that is being searched in the table
      Returns:
      An object of type Client represented by the record from the database

    • findByName

      public static Client findByName​(java.lang.String clientname)
      This method executes the query "SELECT * FROM ordermanagement.client WHERE name = ?"
      Parameters:
      clientname - The name of the client that is being searched in the table
      Returns:
      An object of type Client represented by the record from the database

    • findAllClients

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Client> findAllClients()
      This method executes the query "SELECT * FROM ordermanagement.client"
      Returns:
      A list of objects of type Client represented by the records from the database

    • insert

      public static int insert​(Client client)
      This method executes the query "INSERT INTO ordermanagement.client (id, name, address) VALUES (?,?,?)"
      Parameters:
      client - The client that needs to be stored in the database
      Returns:
      An positive integer representing the number of affected rows after executing the query or -1 in case of error

    • delete

      public static int delete​(int clientid)
      This method executes the query "DELETE FROM ordermanagement.client WHERE id = ?"
      Parameters:
      clientid - The id of the client that needs to be deleted from the database
      Returns:
      1 after executing the query successfully or -1 in case of error
